summary: Verified NIK Info Dialog bug fix for WASKITA LBS. The dialog now correctly displays ALL 15 fields from parsed_data. Tested 3 different NIK entries across 2 targets - all showing complete data.

issues: Dialog requires scrolling to see all 15 fields - last 3 fields (NIK Father, Mother Name, NIK Mother) are below the fold. Consider increasing max-height or making the table more compact.
